name: Crazy Worm
description:
Who remembers the old game - snake? Here is a relative of this game! But we added a little update!1. Color graphics!
2. 3 levels and 3 different locations!
3. Each worm has its own unique abilities!Attention !

Levels are very loud! Also, each level has its own melody,on many levels, it can be very quiet, but on the other irritable! Recommend: Do not play with headphones, to fasten the speaker.

Protect your ears !!!
Find out how the worm has some ability!
Email response in the comments!
